titleStmt.title: Andrewes repentance, sounding alarum to returne from his sins vnto Almightie God. Perfectly guiding all those that hope to bee saued, in the direct way of repentance, whereby they may attain eternall life: : newly made in the autumne or declining of his age ...
titleStmt.author: Andrewes, John, fl. 1615.

titleStmt.title: Andrewes repentance, sounding alarum to returne from his sins vnto Almightie God. Perfectly guiding all those that hope to bee saued, in the direct way of repentance, whereby they may attain eternall life: : newly made in the autumne or declining of his age ...
titleStmt.author: Andrewes, John, fl. 1615.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Iohn Wright and are to be sold at his shop, at the signe of the Bible in Gilt-spur-street, without Newgate.,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped, faded, stained, with print show-through.
Reproduction of the original in: Peterborough Cathedral.
Includes bibliographical references in marginal notes.
